channel.title: World
channel.description: The Washington Post World section provides information and analysis of breaking world news stories. In addition to our world news and video, Post World News offers discussions and blogs on major international news and economic issues.

item.title: Northern Gaza hospital attacked 7 times in one day, director says
item.dc:creator: Rebecca Tan

item.title: Live Briefing: 15 killed, dozens injured in massive strike on central Beirut
item.dc:creator: Kareem Fahim, Frances Vinall, Suzan Haidamous, Rebecca Tan, Victoria Bisset, Bryan Pietsch
item.description: The target of the attack on the Basta area was not immediately clear. The Israel Defense Forces did not appear to have posted an evacuation order for that area beforehand.

item.title: Israel investigates disappearance of Chabad emissary
item.dc:creator: Rebecca Tan

item.title: 4 Italian peacekeepers injured by rocket fire in south Lebanon, U.N. says
item.dc:creator: Adam Taylor, Victoria Bisset

item.title: China looks to step into global vacuum as Trump vows to pull U.S. back
item.dc:creator: Christian Shepherd, Katrina Northrop
item.description: At the COP climate conference, China has been presenting itself as a stable and reliable global leader, seeking to draw a contrast ahead of a second Trump era.

item.title: Major explosion rocks central Beirut, leaving huge crater
item.dc:creator: Frances Vinall, Abbie Cheeseman, Victoria Bisset, Kate Brady, Sammy Westfall, Suzan Haidamous
item.description: At least four missiles hit a site in the Basta neighborhood, Lebanese state media and Reuters reported. The target of the strike was not immediately clear.

item.title: Israeli strikes kill 12 medical workers in Lebanon, including a Baalbek hospital director
item.dc:creator: Abbie Cheeseman, Kareem Fahim, Sammy Westfall, Victoria Bisset

item.title: Israeli strikes kill 12 medical workers in Lebanon, including a Baalbek hospital director
item.dc:creator: Abbie Cheeseman, Kareem Fahim, Sammy Westfall, Victoria Bisset

item.title: U.S. judge clears way for ‘cursed’ giant emerald to return to Brazil
item.dc:creator: Terrence McCoy
item.description: The judge brushed aside pleas from a consortium of U.S. gem spectators who claimed to be the rightful owners.

item.title: Russia seeks to intimidate Ukraine with new missile, officials say
item.dc:creator: David Stern, Siobhán O'Grady, Ellen Francis
item.description: The attack with an intermediate-range ballistic missile has spurred fears of a major escalation in the ongoing war and prompted Ukraine to request new air defenses.

item.title: Cartel leader who faked own death is arrested in California, officials say
item.dc:creator: Vivian Ho
item.description: Cristian Fernando Gutierrez-Ochoa, alleged son-in-law of “El Mencho,” the leader of the Mexican Cártel de Jalisco Nueva Generación (CJNG), was arrested in Riverside.

item.title: 4 Italian peacekeepers injured by rocket fire in southern Lebanon, U.N. says
item.dc:creator: Adam Taylor

item.title: Hungary’s Orban extends invitation to Netanyahu, defying ICC arrest warrants
item.dc:creator: Victoria Bisset, Kate Brady

item.title: What the ICC arrest warrants mean for Netanyahu and Gallant
item.dc:creator: Bryan Pietsch

item.title: Israel ends use of administrative detention orders against West Bank settlers
item.dc:creator: Rebecca Tan

item.title: ICC arrest warrants accuse Netanyahu, Gallant of war crimes in Gaza
item.dc:creator: Kareem Fahim, Louisa Loveluck, Alon Rom

item.title: Meet Lucy, the celebrity of fossils, who changed our view of evolution
item.dc:creator: Carolyn Y. Johnson, Manuel Canales, William Neff, Carson TerBush
item.description: A collection of 3-million-year-old bones unearthed 50 years ago in Ethiopia changed our understanding of human origins.

item.title: American businessman makes play for Russian natural gas pipelines
item.dc:creator: Catherine Belton
item.description: An American businessman is seeking to acquire the Swiss company that controls Russia’s Nord Stream 2, according to documents obtained by The Washington Post.

item.title: How a change in rice farming unexpectedly made India’s air so much worse
item.dc:creator: Karishma Mehrotra
item.description: No one anticipated that an initiative to save groundwater by delaying the annual rice season would aggravate northern India’s already miserable air pollution.

item.title: ICC warrants put spotlight on Israel and its U.S. defenders
item.dc:creator: Ishaan Tharoor
item.description: Many Western countries — including stalwart U.S. and Israeli allies — called for the International Criminal Court’s ruling against Israel’s Benjamin Netanyahu to be respected.

item.title: U.S. case against Adani targets a close ally of Indian prime minister
item.dc:creator: Gerry Shih, Karishma Mehrotra, Anant Gupta
item.description: Adani is seen as an arm of Indian domestic and foreign policy — and a proxy for Prime Minister Narendra Modi.

item.title: Israel and U.S. condemn ICC arrest warrants; other nations vow to enforce
item.dc:creator: Kareem Fahim, Vivian Ho, Frances Vinall, Adam Taylor, Sammy Westfall
item.description: The court issued warrants for Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu and the former defense minister “for crimes against humanity and war crimes.” It also issued a warrant for a Hamas military leader.

item.title: President Joe Biden called the ICC’s issuance of arrest warrants against Israeli leaders “outrageous.”
item.dc:creator: Sammy Westfall

item.title: Russia debuts new missile in Ukraine strike as Putin threatens West
item.dc:creator: David Stern, Karen DeYoung, Ellen Francis, Mary Ilyushina, Missy Ryan
item.description: Russian President Vladimir Putin warned the United States and Ukraine’s other partners that the weapon could be deployed against their interests as well.

item.title: ICC arrest warrants accuse Netanyahu, Gallant of war crimes in Gaza
item.dc:creator: Kareem Fahim, Louisa Loveluck, Alon Rom
item.description: The International Criminal Court said the alleged crimes include starvation as a method of warfare, murder, persecution and other inhumane acts.

item.title: “The antisemitic decision of the International Criminal Court is a modern Dreyfus trial – and will...
item.dc:creator: Sammy Westfall

item.title: What the ICC arrest warrants mean for Netanyahu and Gallant
item.dc:creator: Bryan Pietsch

item.title: Brazilian police allege Bolsonaro led plot to seize power and kill rivals
item.dc:creator: Marina Dias, Terrence McCoy
item.description: In recommending charges against the former president, police say Latin America’s largest country came close to suffering a coup following the 2022 election.

item.title: What the ICC arrest warrants mean for Netanyahu and Gallant
item.dc:creator: Bryan Pietsch
item.description: The warrants for Netanyahu and Gallant could affect their international travel, as some European leaders affirmed they would uphold their obligations as member states of the court.

item.title: Netanyahu calls ICC’s decision ‘antisemitic,’ ‘distorted’
item.dc:creator: Sammy Westfall, Alon Rom

item.title: Senate Democrats force Israel weapons vote, citing Biden inaction
item.dc:creator: Abigail Hauslohner
item.description: The Senate ultimately voted down the measure, brought by Sen. Bernie Sanders and Democratic allies, to block the sale of some U.S.-made weapons to Israel.

item.title: Senate Democrats force Israel weapons vote, citing Biden inaction
item.dc:creator: Abigail Hauslohner
